overview: Stepmothers have been associated with bad, even evil behavior. Which is why young Tera Dice is more than a little suspicious of Dad's hot, new wife. When Tera brings her boyfriend Alan Stafford home to meet the family, Michelle can't hide her burning attraction to her young future son-in-law. Will husband Jay Huntington learn of Michelle's secret passion? Or will vengeful housekeeper Ann Marie have a different plan in store? Stephanie Swift costars in a scorching encounter with Johnny Castle, in this tale of seduction, forbidden desires, and passion.
title: The Stepmother: Sinful Seductions
